name: Car Crash Test: Leap of Death
name_original: Car Crash Test: Leap of Death
description:
Get ready to jump into death arena in this beam drive leap of death car jump? Just hold steering and drive fast. Number of Vehicles to choose from garage. Start mission of leap from roof to ground in high speed. Remember you only hear to play in death ramp avoid to clash with objects. Crash in lead of death in realistic way. Enjoy three game play environment free mode, level mode and stunt arena with leap of death.

Now time to fight in leap of Death with top drive car. Damage your best vehicles to unlock the new levels in crash driving. And enjoy deadly car crashed, stair dummy crash, beam driving and car collision with stair falls in derby destruction simulator. Experience the Extreme realistic car crash games in a realistic mode driving through deadly speed breaker on drift car racing Impossible 3D tracks

Features:
Enjoy unique types of enemies with death cars.
Master skills to car accident in crash mode
Multiple speed bumps with impossible 3D tracks
Real deadly speed breaker on drift car racing
Amazing Environment with Awesome 3D Graphics
